analysis_metadata.complete_analysis: A complete summary, analysis, conclusion, and recommendations. for the audit report (just paragraphs form (VARIOUS PARAGRAPHS)- no lists). IN SPANISH

themes_overview.trend: Description of the trend observed in this theme (e.g., weak enforcement, strong compliance).
relevant_observations: Summarized remark or behavior pattern found in this theme

answer_patterns.pattern_description: Describe what this distribution suggests about the audit (e.g., 'more technical gaps than procedural ones').

remarks_analysis.tone_summary: Describe tone of remarks (neutral, defensive, factual, incomplete, etc.)
remarks_analysis.consistency_with_answers: Describe whether remarks generally align with Yes/No answers
insight_summary: Short list of objective insights extracted from remarks only

data_quality.observations: Describe if data appears complete, consistent, and coherent.

critical_areas.description: Observed lack of encryption in backups and communication channels.

strong_areas.description: Consistent positive answers and complete supporting remarks.

notable_anomalies: Cases where remarks contradict the provided Yes/No answers.
